entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:58 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
